description: An official SIML (Synthetic Intelligence Markup Language) interpreter for .Net Framework. This is a Portable Class Library and can target multiple platforms. Using this library developers can easily create intelligent Chatbots or integrate Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing to their .Net and Mono applications.
releaseNotes:
1. Context now supports Contextual Data [Experimental Stage]
2. Overloaded Chat method with Data call.
3. Math Adapters adds Contextual data on computation.
4. GetSuggestions method in ChatResult now enables suggestions of chat inputs.[Experimental Stage]
5. Fixed case-sensitivity for Reserved Bot, User and Map Sets.
6. Added Add() method to add Enum types to SetCollection.
7. Examples property now returns only pure sentences.
8. Current property on DataCollection returns the last Contextual Data added.[Experimental Stage]
9. Analyzer not ignores parameterized Sets.
10. Fixed minor redirection bug in Goto.
11. Added "O" namespace under specification for "Official" Adapters (Specification Compliance Commit) 
12. Better Cache management
13. Improved KB Load Time
14. Renamed all inbuilt adapters with an "Adapter" suffix

IMPORTANT:

1. Breaking Change -> User variable "Partial-Repeat" is now "Repeat:Is-Partial"
2. Breaking Change -> User variable "Repeat-Count" is now "Repeat:Count"
title: Syn Bot
